item.title: 联邦快递任命首席财务官，敲定即将分拆货运部门的领导团队
item.description: 联邦快递（FedEx）周一表示，已任命公司前高管马歇尔-威特（Marshall Witt）为货运卡车部门的财务主管，10 月 15 日起生效，从而完成了该部门的领导团队，该部门将于 2026 年 6 月分拆。【原文：FedEx said on Monday it has appointed former company executive Marshall Witt as the finance chief of its freight trucking unit, effective October 15, completing the leadership team for the division that is set to spin off in June 2026.】

item.title: 比特币在历史最高点附近徘徊
item.description: 比特币周一徘徊在历史最高点附近，全球市值最大的加密货币继续受益于投资者的强劲需求。【原文：Bitcoin hovered near its record high on Monday as the world's largest cryptocurrency by market value continued to benefit from strong demand from investors.】

item.title: 工会敦促空中交通管制员在停航情况下继续工作
item.description: 代表 13,000 多名空中交通管制员的工会周一敦促工人们在政府部分停摆期间继续坚守岗位，因为停摆要求他们停薪留职。【原文：The union representing more than 13,000 air traffic controllers on Monday urged workers to remain on the job during the ongoing partial government shutdown that requires them to work without pay.】

item.title: 备忘录称摩根大通任命希勒里和维尔茨为欧洲、中东和非洲地区联席首席执行官
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，摩根大通周一任命 Conor Hillery 和 Matthieu Wiltz 为欧洲、中东和非洲地区联席首席执行官。【原文：JPMorgan Chase on Monday named Conor Hillery and Matthieu Wiltz as co-chief executive officers for Europe, the Middle East and Africa, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 9 月最后一周每周申请失业救济人数温和增长 - Haver Analytics
item.description: 哈弗分析公司（Haver Analytics）的数据显示，在 9 月份的最后一周，新申请失业救济金的美国人数量略有增加，这表明，即使招聘工作停滞不前，裁员人数仍处于较低水平。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits increased marginally during the last week of September, data from Haver Analytics showed, pointing to a still low level of layoffs even as hiring has stalled.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回软件巨头 SAP 回避竞争对手反垄断诉讼的请求
item.description: 美国最高法院周一拒绝审理欧洲最大软件制造商 SAP 为避免美国数据技术公司 Teradata 指控其违反美国反垄断法而提出的诉讼。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Monday to hear a bid by Europe's largest software maker SAP to avoid a lawsuit by U.S. data technology company Teradata that accused it of violating American antitrust law.】

item.title: 巴里克将出售汤贡矿，交易金额高达 3.05 亿美元
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining）周一表示，将以不超过 3.05 亿美元的价格向大西洋集团（Atlantic Group）出售其在 Tongon 金矿的权益和在象牙海岸的部分资产，这家加拿大矿业公司希望借此加强其资产负债表。【原文：Barrick Mining said on Monday it will sell its interests in the Tongon gold mine and certain assets in Ivory Coast to Atlantic Group for up to $305 million as the Candian miner looks to strengthen its balance sheet.】

item.title: 行业警告：美国烈酒出口下滑，饮酒者避开美国品牌
item.description: 根据美国蒸馏酒理事会周一发布的一份报告，第二季度美国烈酒出口下降了 9%，该报告警告说，贸易紧张局势正在打击主要市场的需求。【原文：Exports of U.S. spirits fell 9% in the second quarter, according to a report by the Distilled Spirits Council of the United States published on Monday, which warned that trade tensions were hitting demand in key markets.】

item.title: 谁是巴里-魏斯，CBS 新闻的新任掌门人？
item.description: 当 Bari Weiss 走进哥伦比亚广播公司新闻频道担任总编辑时，她将带来爱德华-默罗（Edward R. Murrow）和沃尔特-克朗凯特（Walter Cronkite）的故居在其近一个世纪的历史中从未见过的东西：一位以挑战新闻业最庄严机构为职业生涯基础的领导者。【原文：When Bari Weiss walks into CBS News as editor-in-chief, she'll bring something the former home of Edward R. Murrow and Walter Cronkite has not seen in its nearly century-long history: a leader whose career has been built on challenging journalism’s most august institutions.】

item.title: 特朗普政府领导下的美国地区银行兼并势头强劲
item.description: 美国地区性银行正在加快兼并步伐，原因是人们期望特朗普政府采取更宽松的监管措施，以及寻求扩大资产负债表，以便在经济和经营压力下更好地与大型贷款机构竞争。【原文：U.S. regional banks are ramping up mergers, fueled by expectations of a lighter regulatory approach under the Trump administration and the quest for bigger balance sheets that will help compete better against larger lenders amid economic and operational pressures.】

item.title: 弗兰克-比西尼亚诺被任命为美国国税局首席执行官
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一宣布，弗兰克-比西尼亚诺（Frank Bisignano）将担任国内税收署首席执行官。【原文：Frank Bisignano will serve as chief executive officer of the Internal Revenue Service, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent announced on Monday.】

item.title: 安进公司将以六折价格向美国消费者直销胆固醇药物
item.description: 安进公司（Amgen）周一以折扣现金价格在美国直接面向消费者销售其胆固醇药物Repatha，成为回应美国政治压力、降低药价的最新一家制药公司。【原文：Amgen on Monday launched direct-to-consumer U.S. sales of its cholesterol medication Repatha at a discounted cash price, becoming the latest pharmaceutical company responding to U.S. political pressure to lower drug prices.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）表示：更好的政策、更深的市场有助于新兴经济体抵御冲击
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）的一项研究表明，由于新兴市场经济体制定了可信的通胀目标、改善了外汇制度并建立了强有力的财政保护机制，它们在抵御全球重大经济冲击方面变得更加出色。【原文：Emerging market economies have become better at weathering major global economic shocks thanks to their credible inflation targeting, improved foreign exchange regimes and strong fiscal guardrails, a study by the International Monetary Fund showed.】

item.title: 查特工业公司支持以 136 亿美元的价格出售给贝克休斯公司
item.description: Chart Industries 周一表示，其股东投票通过了贝克休斯对该公司的收购。【原文：Chart Industries said on Monday that its shareholders voted to approve the company's acquisition by Baker Hughes .】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，美国财政部贝森特将留任国税局局长
item.description: 据 CNBC 周一援引消息人士的话报道，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）将继续留任国内税收署署长一职。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent will remain in his role as commissioner of the Internal Revenue Service, CNBC reported on Monday citing sources.】

item.title: 自由新闻》创始人巴里-韦斯与派拉蒙签约后被任命为哥伦比亚广播公司新闻编辑
item.description: 派拉蒙天舞公司首席执行官大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）任命巴里-韦斯（Bari Weiss）为哥伦比亚广播公司新闻主编，作为收购她创办的在线新闻网站《自由新闻》（The Free Press）交易的一部分。【原文：Paramount Skydance CEO David Ellison has named Bari Weiss editor-in-chief of CBS News, as part of a deal to acquire the online news site she founded, The Free Press.】

item.title: Verizon 任命 PayPal 前老板丹-舒尔曼为首席执行官
item.description: Verizon 周一表示，前 PayPal 老板丹-舒尔曼（Dan Schulman）将接替汉斯-维斯特伯格（Hans Vestberg）出任该电信运营商的首席执行官，即刻生效。【原文：Verizon said on Monday former PayPal boss Dan Schulman would replace Hans Vestberg as CEO of the telecom operator effective immediately.】

item.title: 外国企业关注美国扩张以减轻关税影响
item.description: 一些非美国公司表示，它们正在考虑扩大在美国的业务或在美国开店，以减轻唐纳德-特朗普总统对进口商品征收关税的影响。【原文：Some non-U.S. companies have said they are looking at expanding their presence or setting up shop in the United States to mitigate the impact of President Donald Trump's tariffs on imported goods.】

item.title: 预测显示今年美国假日销售增长乏力
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统反复无常的贸易政策对经济造成的影响，使购物者对购买奢侈礼品更加谨慎，因此美国零售商为今年的假日购物季低迷做好了准备。【原文：U.S. retailers brace for a subdued holiday shopping season this year as the economic fallout from President Donald Trump's erratic trade policies leaves shoppers more cautious about buying extravagant gifts.】

item.title: 阿斯利康与美国 Algen 公司签订高达 5.55 亿美元的协议，开发基因疗法
item.description: Algen 生物技术公司周一表示，该公司已同意向阿斯利康公司授予使用其人工智能驱动平台开发基因疗法的许可，这笔交易价值高达 5.55 亿美元。【原文：Algen Biotechnologies said on Monday it has agreed to grant AstraZeneca a license to develop gene therapies the U.S.-based biotech discovers using its artificial intelligence-driven platform, in a deal worth up to $555 million.】

item.title: 受经济不确定性影响，美国假日在线销售增长放缓：Adobe Analytics
item.description: 根据数据公司 Adobe Analytics 周一发布的预测，由于宏观经济的不确定性继续给消费者支出带来压力，预计今年美国假日在线销售的增长速度将有所放缓。【原文：U.S. holiday online sales are expected to grow at a slower pace this year, according to projections by data firm Adobe Analytics released on Monday, as macroeconomic uncertainty continues to pressure consumer spending.】

item.title: 巴黎检察院调查苹果语音助手 Siri
item.description: 巴黎检察官办公室周一表示，在接到投诉后，正在对苹果公司的语音助手 Siri 进行调查。【原文：The Paris prosecutor's office said on Monday it was investigating Siri, Apple's voice assistant, after it received a complaint.】

item.title: 欧盟对美国天然气的使用量将激增，加剧价格波动
item.description: 据分析师和数据显示，由于储量减少以及来自俄罗斯和阿尔及利亚的管道流量下降，欧洲今年冬天将需要额外进口多达160船液化天然气，从而加深对美国天然气的依赖。【原文：Europe will need to import up to 160 additional liquefied natural gas cargoes this winter due to lower storage and a decline in pipeline flows from Russia and Algeria, according to analysts and data, deepening its dependency on U.S. gas.】

item.title: 券商普遍看好 Klarna，权衡增长前景与成本上升的关系
item.description: 周一，券商开始对 "现购现付"（BNPL）贷款机构 Klarna 进行报道，尽管一些券商警告称，成本上升可能会给近期盈利能力带来压力，但券商普遍看好 Klarna。【原文：Brokerages are largely bullish on buy-now-pay-later (BNPL) lender Klarna as they begin coverage on Monday, though some warn that rising costs could pressure near-term profitability.】

item.title: 特斯拉 9 月德国汽车销量下降，但电动汽车销量大幅增长
item.description: 德国道路交通机构 KBA 周一表示，尽管电池电动汽车的总体销量同比增长了 31.9%，但特斯拉 9 月份在德国的销量下降了 9.4%。【原文：Tesla's sales volume in Germany fell by 9.4% in September, the German road traffic agency KBA said on Monday, although overall sales of battery electric vehicles rose by 31.9% year on year.】

item.title: 数据显示，第三季度人工智能风险投资继续激增
item.description: 随着华尔街对人工智能相关公司的热捧，Crunchbase 周一提供的数据显示，该行业在第三季度获得了大量风险投资，包括 Anthropic 在内的多家公司获得了数十亿美元的投资。【原文：As the rush towards AI-related companies continues on Wall Street, data from Crunchbase showed on Monday that the sector enjoyed a bulk of venture funding in the third quarter, with names including Anthropic raking in billions.】

item.title: 法拉利完成菲奥拉诺附近的电子涡流测试赛道
item.description: 法拉利跑车制造商本周一表示，在不到四个月的时间内，法拉利已完成了其菲奥兰诺测试赛道旁的新测试赛道--e-漩涡赛道的建设。【原文：Ferrari has completed the construction of e-Vortex, the new test circuit next to its Fiorano test track in less than four months, the sports car maker said on Monday.】

item.title: AMD 与 OpenAI 签订人工智能芯片供应协议，允许其持有 10%的股份
item.description: AMD 周一表示，它将向 OpenAI 供应人工智能芯片，这是一项为期多年的交易，将带来数百亿美元的年收入，而且 ChatGPT 的创建者可以选择购买这家芯片制造商最多约 10% 的股份。【原文：AMD said on Monday it will supply artificial intelligence chips to OpenAI in a multi-year deal that would bring in tens of billions of dollars in annual revenue and give the ChatGPT creator the option to buy up to roughly 10% of the chipmaker.】

item.title: 特朗普政府推动对稀土公司和芯片制造商的投资
item.description: 特朗普政府正在加大力度，通过将联邦拨款转化为关键公司的股权，确保美国关键矿物和半导体供应链的安全。【原文：The Trump administration is ramping up its efforts to secure U.S. supply chains for critical minerals and semiconductors by converting federal grants into equity stakes in key companies.】

item.title: 美国第五第三银行将以 109 亿美元收购地区性贷款机构 Comerica
item.description: 美国第五第三银行（Fifth Third）周一同意以价值 109 亿美元的全股票交易收购地区性贷款机构 Comerica，旨在扩大其在主要增长市场的业务。【原文：U.S. bank Fifth Third on Monday agreed to buy regional lender Comerica in an all-stock deal valued at $10.9 billion, aiming to expand its presence in key growth markets.】
